title.narrative: Right to Water Initiative: Protecting Glaciers and Containing Fracking

description.narrative:
The overall goal of the initiative is to strengthen glacier protection and raise the awareness of the importance of glaciers and permafrost areas to communities and ecosystems as well as to raise the public awareness of the social and environmental risks of hydraulic fracturing (fracking) operations and help strengthen the legal and public policy framework to address these risks.
Specific objectives included:
• to help implement the Argentine Glacier Protection Law, • to strengthen glacier and permafrost protection in Argentina and other jurisdictions • to raise awareness of the role of glaciers and permafrost play for communities and ecosystems, • to deepen social awareness of the risks of hydraulic fracturing operations, • to improve provincial and national laws and regulations to control hydraulic fracturing, as well as • to promote community access to remedies and recourse in cases involving social and environmental impacts of hydraulic fracturing operations.
